name: MTLDispatchThreadgroupsIndirectArguments
desc: The data layout required for the arguments needed to specify the size of threadgroups.

items.desc: Returns a new data layout for dispatching threadgroups via indirect buffer calls.

items.desc: The number of threadgroups for the grid, in each dimension.
